mapper.select: select lpnumber, lparea1, lparea2, lparea3, lpspecies, lpgender, lpcolor, lpbreed, lpstatus, lpcontent, unum, lptime, lpimage from lostpet lp join user u on lp.unum = u.unum order by 1 desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
mapper.insert: insert into lostpet (select lparea1, lparea2, lparea3, lpspecies, lpgender, lpcolor, lpbreed, lpimage, lpstatus, lptime, lpcontent, unum) values(#{lparea1},#{lparea2},#{lparea3}, #{lpspecies}, #{lpgender}, #{lpcolor}, #{lpbreed}, #{lpimage}, #{lpstatus}, #{lptime}, #{lpcontent})
